          <title>
            <string language="fr">Pluies acides</string>
            <string language="en">Acid Rain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saurer Regen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chuva Ácida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pioggia Acida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όξινη βροχή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lluvia Ácida</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Climat global : Pluies acides.  Animation interactive montrant comment la pollution atmosphérique cause les pluies acides et comment les pluies acides affectent l'environnement.</string>
            <string language="en">Global climate: Acid rain. Interactive animation showing how air pollution causes acid rain and how acid rain affects the environment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Pollution</string>
            <string language="en">Pollution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pluies acides</string>
            <string language="en">acid rain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">dioxyde de soufre</string>
            <string language="en">sulfur dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">oxydes d'azote</string>
            <string language="en">oxides of nitrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Globales Klima: Saurer Regen. 
Interaktive Animationvertretung, wie Luftverschmutzung sauren 
Regen verursacht und wie saurer Regen die Umgebung beeinflußt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Clima global: Chuva ácida. 
Exibição interativa do animation como a poluição de ar causa
a chuva ácida e como a chuva ácida afeta o ambiente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Clima globale: Pioggia acida. 
Rappresentazione interattiva di animazione come l'inquinamento 
atmosferico causa la pioggia acida e come la pioggia acida interessa 
l'ambiente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παγκόσμιο κλίμα: Όξινη βροχή. Διαλογική 
ζωτικότητα που επιδεικνύει πώς η ατμοσφαιρική ρύπανση προκαλεί 
την όξινη βροχή και πώς η όξινη βροχή έχει επιπτώσεις στο 
περιβάλλον.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Clima global: Lluvia ácida. 
Demostración interactiva de la animación cómo la 
contaminación atmosférica causa la lluvia ácida y cómo la lluvia 
ácida afecta el ambiente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verunreinigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">saurer Regen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwefeldioxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Oxide des Stickstoffes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">chuva ácida</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
